题目：一家量化投资机构希望优化其股票买入策略，避免一次性买入过多股票。他们计划筛选出符合以下条件的股票：按照上个交易日收盘价对应过去130个交易日+2倍标准差的相对位置最低的12只股票，并对其进行等权买入。以下哪段代码能够实现这一目标？  A.  ```pythonimport pandas as pd  import numpy as np  def select_stocks(data):      data['std'] = data['close'].rolling(130).std()      data['mean'] = data['close'].rolling(130).mean()      data['upper_band'] = data['mean'] + 2 * data['std']      data['relative_pos'] = (data['close'] - data['mean']) / data['std']      top_12 = data.nsmallest(12, 'relative_pos')      return top_12  ```B.  ```pythonimport pandas as pd  import numpy as np  def select_stocks(data):      data['std'] = data['close'].rolling(130).std()      data['mean'] = data['close'].rolling(130).mean()      data['upper_band'] = data['mean'] + 2 * data['std']      data['relative_pos'] = (data['close'] - data['mean']) / data['std']      top_12 = data.nlargest(12, 'relative_pos')      return top_12  ```C.  ```pythonimport pandas as pd  import numpy as np  def select_stocks(data):      data['std'] = data['close'].rolling(130).std()      data['mean'] = data['close'].rolling(130).mean()      data['upper_band'] = data['mean'] + 2 * data['std']      data['relative_pos'] = (data['close'] - data['mean']) / data['std']      top_12 = data.sort_values('relative_pos').head(12)      return top_12  ```D.  ```pythonimport pandas as pd  import numpy as np  def select_stocks(data):      data['std'] = data['close'].rolling(130).std()      data['mean'] = data['close'].rolling(130).mean()      data['upper_band'] = data['mean'] + 2 * data['std']      data['relative_pos'] = (data['close'] - data['mean']) / data['std']      top_12 = data.sample(n=12)      return top_12  ```

题目：以下是一段用于计算1991-2022年EAPC（年度百分比变化）及其95%置信区间的R语言代码片段。假设数据框df包含列ln_rate_1991和ln_rate_2022，分别表示1991年和2022年的对数率值。请问以下哪个代码片段能够正确实现这一目标？  A. eapc <- (log(df$ln_rate_2022) - log(df$ln_rate_1991)) / 31 * 100     se <- sqrt(1/df$ln_rate_1991 + 1/df$ln_rate_2022)     upper_ci <- eapc + qnorm(0.975) * se     lower_ci <- eapc - qnorm(0.975) * se B. eapc <- (log(df$ln_rate_2022) - log(df$ln_rate_1991)) / 31 * 100     se <- sqrt(var(log(df$ln_rate_1991)) + var(log(df$ln_rate_2022)))     upper_ci <- eapc + qt(0.975, df = nrow(df) - 1) * se     lower_ci <- eapc - qt(0.975, df = nrow(df) - 1) * se C. eapc <- (df$ln_rate_2022 - df$ln_rate_1991) / 31 * 100     se <- sd(c(df$ln_rate_1991, df$ln_rate_2022)) / sqrt(nrow(df))     upper_ci <- eapc + qnorm(0.975) * se     lower_ci <- eapc - qnorm(0.975) * se D. eapc <- (log(df$ln_rate_2022) - log(df$ln_rate_1991)) / 31 * 100     se <- abs(log(df$ln_rate_2022) - log(df$ln_rate_1991)) / sqrt(2 * nrow(df))     upper_ci <- eapc + qt(0.975, df = 31) * se     lower_ci <- eapc - qt(0.975, df = 31) * se

题目：以下关于投资回报率（ROI）、内部收益率（IRR）和资产负债率（DAR）的描述，哪一项是正确的？  A. 投资回报率（ROI）衡量的是投资项目净收益与总投资的比例；内部收益率（IRR）是指使项目净现值为零的折现率；资产负债率（DAR）表示总资产中由负债提供的资金比例。公式分别为：ROI = （净收益 / 总投资）× 100%，IRR 满足 NPV = 0 的条件，DAR = （总负债 / 总资产）× 100%。  B. 投资回报率（ROI）衡量的是投资项目毛收益与总投资的比例；内部收益率（IRR）是指使项目未来现金流现值等于初始投资的折现率；资产负债率（DAR）表示净资产占总资产的比例。公式分别为：ROI = （毛收益 / 总投资）× 100%，IRR 满足未来现金流现值等于初始投资，DAR = （净资产 / 总资产）× 100%。  C. 投资回报率（ROI）衡量的是投资项目总收入与总成本的比例；内部收益率（IRR）是指使项目未来现金流现值等于零的折现率；资产负债率（DAR）表示总负债占总权益的比例。公式分别为：ROI = （总收入 / 总成本）× 100%，IRR 满足未来现金流现值为零，DAR = （总负债 / 总权益）× 100%。  D. 投资回报率（ROI）衡量的是投资项目净收益与总成本的比例；内部收益率（IRR）是指使项目未来现金流现值等于初始投资的折现率；资产负债率（DAR）表示总负债占总资产的比例。公式分别为：ROI = （净收益 / 总成本）× 100%，IRR 满足未来现金流现值等于初始投资，DAR = （总负债 / 总资产）× 100%。

题目：一家量化投资机构希望优化其股票买入策略，避免一次性买入过多股票。他们计划筛选出符合以下条件的股票：按照上个交易日收盘价对应过去200个交易日+2倍标准差的相对位置最低的20只股票，并对其进行等权买入。以下哪段代码能够实现这一目标？  A.  ```pythonimport pandas as pd  import numpy as np  def select_stocks(data):      data['std'] = data['close'].rolling(200).std()      data['mean'] = data['close'].rolling(200).mean()      data['upper_band'] = data['mean'] + 2 * data['std']      data['relative_pos'] = (data['close'] - data['mean']) / data['std']      top_20 = data.nsmallest(20, 'relative_pos')      return top_20  ```B.  ```pythonimport pandas as pd  import numpy as np  def select_stocks(data):      data['std'] = data['close'].rolling(200).std()      data['mean'] = data['close'].rolling(200).mean()      data['upper_band'] = data['mean'] + 2 * data['std']      data['relative_pos'] = (data['close'] - data['mean']) / data['std']      top_20 = data.nlargest(20, 'relative_pos')      return top_20  ```C.  ```pythonimport pandas as pd  import numpy as np  def select_stocks(data):      data['std'] = data['close'].rolling(200).std()      data['mean'] = data['close'].rolling(200).mean()      data['upper_band'] = data['mean'] + 2 * data['std']      data['relative_pos'] = (data['close'] - data['mean']) / data['std']      top_20 = data.sort_values('relative_pos').head(20)      return top_20  ```D.  ```pythonimport pandas as pd  import numpy as np  def select_stocks(data):      data['std'] = data['close'].rolling(200).std()      data['mean'] = data['close'].rolling(200).mean()      data['upper_band'] = data['mean'] + 2 * data['std']      data['relative_pos'] = (data['close'] - data['mean']) / data['std']      top_20 = data.sample(n=20)      return top_20  ```
